website_summaries.verdict: The comfort and utility of the Skechers Elite Flex - Hartnell impressed a significant number of people. Even though some were not happy that the white portion got dirty too often, the overall feedback about the trainer was highly positive. Many users even ended up purchasing multiple pairs of the model.
pros: A considerable number of buyers found the Skechers Elite Flex - Hartnell to be perfect for daily walking and casual wear
It was highly praised as a comfortable walking shoe by a vast majority of wearers
Many people appreciated that the footwear was fast and easy to slip on without the need for tying the laces
The trainer was also found to be stylish by most users
cons: Several users warned that the white textured sole gets dirty easily
It has to be washed on a regular basis

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pair of extremely comfortable trainers. I am a member of Team GB Sports JuJitsu Squad, and needed a pair of trainers but I do have a Wide fitting especially on one foot, so the big brand trainers you see in the sports shops simply won't fit as they are always too narrow. These sketchers I found to be a very comfortable fit, good for everyday training around the gym, and comfortable to walk/run in. Hope they don't change the style as I will definitely be buying another pair soon. The fastenings also make them ideal for my particular training as they are on and off all the time.
customer_reviews.author: M D Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Like Walking on Air
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever had. I have difficulty walking due to an ankle problem but with these Skechers it is like walking on air. I can't believe how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: allan

customer_reviews.title: What I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are exceptionally comfortable and lightweight. Very good quality. The faux laces actually look pretty good and the shoe is easy to slip on and off, without it feeling like it could come off during normal wearing. Colour looks smart, so very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Great support, slightly larger fit
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you go down a size as Skechers are often slightly larger; however these are super comfortable and great for manual labour jobs! I actually bought these for when I started working for amazon as a warehouse operative and they’ve done me well ever since! Super comfy and support you nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Zahid

customer_reviews.title: 1st of all liked the look of these and with the comfort of ...
customer_reviews.text: 1st of all liked the look of these and with the comfort of the 1st I had a week before decided to purchase like the 1st pair amazingly comfortable on holiday in Benidorm walking for miles love them. Been wearing sandles in daytime but had to stop agony on my feet so these have been even more of a blessing.
customer_reviews.author: adric

customer_reviews.title: no laces, but they seem to work OK
customer_reviews.text: Suprised by the lack of laces. They are easy to slip on and feel tight on the foot. Very comfortable to wear. My fourth pair of Skechers, all the others have been good and have lasted well but have had overlong laces that tend to come undone occasionally. No such problem with these.
customer_reviews.author: SimonGP

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy smart trainers
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfy and look good. I bought them at £64 but the day they arrived they were showing at £32.99. So I've sent them back and reordered under this new price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but be careful on size (too big)
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good and extra comfortable...... but I bought one and returned for too big size. The second pair though ordered 1and a half size smaller than first one is still bigger than what I usually wear in UK. But felt embarrassed to return for same reason as first one. I kept for my eldest son.
customer_reviews.author: Denisa boalca

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and reduce sweat stink
customer_reviews.text: My other half loves these, very comfy for his smelling sweaty trotters. He is a nightmare to buy for and goes through trainers like you wouldn't believe, but they have helped reduce the stink I usually have to deal with, not by much but much better than the others and he says they feel wonderful X
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Last time I bought slip on shoes was over 40 years ago, but these are better than I expected. As with all Sketchers, they are immediately comfortable if the size is right. I normally have UK 10.5 or 11, and these in size 11 are perfect, not loose, not too tight. Nothing negative to say.
customer_reviews.author: It's only me!

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with duff knees
customer_reviews.text: so ordered as a birthday present from my mother in law. they are a delight to wear and help my duff knee on my 5k and 10k walks. I will definitely get another pair when I walk the trainers to death.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought them the most comfortable trainer I've ever worn,if your buying a pair take the next size down I take a size 10 usually but on everyones advice I bought a 9.5 they fit perfectly. When I buy another pair of trainers it will certainly be Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. Bennie

customer_reviews.title: Total comfort
customer_reviews.text: Theses sneakers are totally comfortable, soft and light. They're stylish, looking like a lace trainer but being a slip on. Highly recommended from this very satisfied 70 year old...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just love these trainers.
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers. They're my second pair of Sketchers and I loved my previous laced ones so much I decided to buy the brand again. I wasn't disappointed. Really comfortable, easy to get on and off, look smart... really pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Try for size before discarding the box.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and delivery. They were the correct size I had ordered although With the Bungee type lace, the shoe isn’t as tight a fit as a normal lace type shoe. Pity I had thrown out the box before my partner had tried them for fit. I’d recommend a smaller size for this type of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Fussy of Falkirk

customer_reviews.title: Like Walking on a Cloud
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I have two pairs of these now and love them. They are light, easy to put on, stylish and did I say comfortable? The offer great arch support with the memory foam sole, I could walk all day in these I think. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Portonian

customer_reviews.title: Supplied in time and so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve previously had a pair of these before bought from a Skechers outlet and I’ve had them for a couple of years. They are so comfortable and fit well. I can wear them for general use and for exercising. If they still make them in a couple of years time I will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: malc ryder

customer_reviews.title: Skechers shose.
customer_reviews.text: The trainers are very comfortable and light. There is very good cushion which is important for me because I use them for running. They look elegant and sporty I can walk going around town as well. It may sound strange but they make walking easier for me. Because they are made of breathable fabric my feet are always dry even after 30 minutes jogging. I always been sceptic baying shoes and clothes without being able to try them on, but I had no problems. Quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kostadin Todorov

customer_reviews.title: Fanrastic 👍👍👏👏
customer_reviews.text: My son is autistic and was curious buying these as he is very peticular with shoes but wow he loved them great value and lovely looking shoe 👏👏👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfy, perfect fit and very breathable. I bought a rubbish copy off ebay for cheap and was sorely disappointed, these more than meet expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Barrow

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to slip on. Comfortable. The flexibility of the material means a looser fit than I expected. Go for the smaller size you would choose. It's more likely to fit.
customer_reviews.author: chrislw

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth £50
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable Very light weight But are falling apart after only 2months of average use
customer_reviews.author: Sheen

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style over support
customer_reviews.text: They’re as comfortable as the reviews say but they offer zero ankle support. If you’re after comfortable slip-ons that look like trainers then these are for you. If, however, you’re hoping for shoes you can train in then these aren’t those.
customer_reviews.author: C Yarrow

customer_reviews.title: Go a half size smaller than usual then they’ll fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: As with previous purchases I found that it is best to buy half a size smaller than your usual UK size which is what I did with this pair of Skechers nd they fit perfectly. Is there anything Like my last pair then they will be able to stand up to a long period of heavy use is a great use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and smart trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, great colour, smart trainer. Easy to slip on and off. Good fit, comfortable. Excellent delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: Anniethegranny

customer_reviews.title: buy for posing not exercising
customer_reviews.text: Typical pair of poser trainers. There is no way you can do serious exercise in these.. as soon as I started to run they flap about like a pair of flip floos. Why do manufacturers think that slip ons can be used for exercise My fault I tried them after seeing the reviews.... if you want to pose in a pub they are spot on... if you want to exercise a surely no use at all
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Sanford

customer_reviews.title: SKETCHERS Trainers
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, I took them out of the box as soon as it arrived (on time) and I haven't taken them off since other than bedtime. Very comfortable and look smart with my attire
customer_reviews.author: Salopian2104

customer_reviews.title: Light and flexible slip on trainers
customer_reviews.text: The sole is highly supportable on a curved sole which gives an even foot strike. at the same time as being flexible and light. They can be worn as trainers or casual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. I. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Never bought Sketchers before, but these are wonderful! Fit well and seem to do a great job. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RogN

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable! love my Sketchers!
customer_reviews.text: Every pair of Sketchers I get seem to be the most comfortable footware I've ever worn. They are producing some really nice looking trainers now and these fit the bill nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Skechers all the way...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Skechers for years and I've never been disappointed. The satisfaction continues with my current pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Comfy fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son and was well received. Bought a size 10, fit was perfect. Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.author: J Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight trainers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Lightweight trainer and live the bungee ties. Walk miles in these!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Great all round trainer, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: As expected from Sketchers, comfortable and stylish, memory foam insole is good but been a little better in my other trainers
customer_reviews.author: ian watkins

customer_reviews.title: Very big made
customer_reviews.text: They're nice, but they're awfully big. I'm walking out of them - my heel is coming right out, and this is my usual size. Also, the memory foam insole seems to have been put in rather haphazardly as it is half on the bottom of the shoe and half up the side of it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie P

customer_reviews.title: Large fit in Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Order 9.5 UK (10.5 USA) I am a comfortable fit in adidas etc at 9.5 UK, these were v loose and even after I put in insole to tighten it was still too loose. Would recommend ordering half size below what u normally wear...at least
customer_reviews.author: alan gleeson

customer_reviews.title: Slightly large.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe but had to go down half size normally a 10 so exchanged for 9.5 and they’re great. Comfy and light. Would buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and stops me from bending and giving me back pain, not taken them off and dreading the snow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are superior quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of Sketchers Trainers for my husband as a birthday present. He is fussy about his trainers so I chose carefully. I wasn't disappointed, he loves them. so I ordered a pair for my son and they are just what he wanted too. So I am very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Another pair of comfy sketches.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to add to my ever growing collection of sketches. They look amazing and are very comfortable. A very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Skechers are amazingly comfortable and light with memory foam soles - You wouldn’t know you had anything on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTTY

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I bought for my dad and he is really happy
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable and perfect fit. 4 star because I feel that its a bit over priced.
customer_reviews.author: S S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: They are genuine Sketchers, all bells and whistles in the box, brilliant fit, colour, style and at a fair price. Will be buying again

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent well pleased comfort and quality at a good price

customer_reviews.title: 2 months and a hole in the heel.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for 2 months now and walk 3k 5 days a week, the general condition of the shoe is as new however the sole has worn a hole at the heel. I am 12 stone 10lb male. i will try and send them back.

customer_reviews.title: Wore out in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Shoes lovely and comfortable but after 3 weeks a hole developed inside at the heel and cut my husbands foot up ! Customer services great and organised return and refund. Such a shame as shoes so comfortable but no good if only last a few weeks.

customer_reviews.title: Modern design shoe with 100% comfort.
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing to dislike, they are exceptionally stylish, and look great. For comfort easily 10 out of 10.

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Bought for summer so haven’t worn them in earnest yet, just around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Second pair bought for adult son. Very popular for walking.

customer_reviews.title: Utter comfort and style.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable trainers ever worn. Would recommend order one size down than your normal size for perfect fit.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, easy to get on, breathable
customer_reviews.text: perfect in every way, easy to get on ( my husband has severe arthritis) very comfortable, 'like slippers'

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm diabetic with bad feet n these definitely makes walking a lot more comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Too long, check sizing
customer_reviews.text: Returned as they were too long. Good quality other than the fit.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great casual shoe, bungee slip on is great, very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just amazing. So convenient to slip on, and they slip on and off easily and still keep a snug fit when on. The soles are super absorbent and don't warm up as expected from memory phone. Brilliant shoes 10/10.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Light shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes and well priced compared to Skechers direct shops.
customer_reviews.author: Kumar Amitesh

customer_reviews.title: The neck of trainer pulled in
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Skechers trainers and the fit is usually amazing – this product however I did send back but only because it was rubbing at the back of my heel. The neoprene top was a little too tight for my liking
customer_reviews.author: Leeplee

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, with a slightly raised heel (which adds to the cushioning when walking). So flexible and light on the feet. The memory foam is great.
customer_reviews.author: S Allen

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy trainers I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: First time I have ever owned sketchers. Wow, they are soooo comfy. Don’t think I’m going to wear anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Buy and try
customer_reviews.text: I will buy these again Very good for your feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the trainers perfect footwear and very good delivery service
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfortable light weight trainers!
customer_reviews.text: Best Skechers I've owned yet! Standing on comfortable memory foam insoles, these trainers acts like little soft pillow for your feet. Amazing outer soles give great traction and grip. Very light weight and give your feet proper cooling.
customer_reviews.author: MR JC Lowndes

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These look good and are really comfortable. I've had sketchers before so knew what to expect, and these look smart enough to wear at work I noticed the comments about ordering a little smaller, so went 9 instead of 9 1/2 and they fit well, as were a little cheaper, result!
customer_reviews.author: Neil K

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Love skechers, good fit and their sizing is spot on for me as when you have big feet its hard to find good shoes
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Grocott

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest trainers in the world
customer_reviews.text: The comfiest shoes I've ever owned! So easy to take on/off and super comfortable. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Very very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very comfortable, also love no laces saves that wee bit of hassle when lazy like me.
customer_reviews.author: noel hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lovely trainer fit nice look good and ever so comfy on foot
customer_reviews.author: Mazzzer

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Whatever size you’re usually in other shoes, order the size below with sketchers. The most comfortable trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Slip on trainers
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair for 3 years, heels just wearing now, so bought 2 more pairs, one black & one navy. The soles are comfortable, easy to slip on & supportive / lightweight. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Green

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrific comfort level and fit, a real go to shoe

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these shoes. They are super comfy and fit perfectly. I bought them for treadmill walking and they have proved just right for the job.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Returned, poor fit, too tight across the top of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Review Buddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for to work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like walking on air!! Very comfortable!! For the moment i'm very happy with my new trainers!!

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but faulty
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are mega comfy as expected, but the elastic lace broke after one wear, which is annoying.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, no fuss.
customer_reviews.text: They just slip on and are good to go. I am on my feet 8 hours a day at work and they are delivering perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: dont have second thoughts
customer_reviews.text: most comfortable trainer I have ever worn, light to wear will buy again

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great look, very comfortable. Bought these for holiday as alot of walking was going to be done at a lot of theme parks. Loved the Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were a very odd fit. I'm a ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were a very odd fit. I'm a 10.5 and both 10.5 and 10 were too long and wide.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Cork

customer_reviews.title: So soooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: Light, comfortable, the best footwear ever. I'm now looking to get my wife a pair of SKECHERS
customer_reviews.author: edward b lees

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of skechers in less than a month, and both pairs are quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gareth S.

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable went half a size down to normal makes a nice change to my usual hightops
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On 4th pair!
customer_reviews.text: Really light & comfortable...my 4th pair! . Says it all really
customer_reviews.author: christopher simpson

customer_reviews.title: Trendy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these trainers, sketchers are a great make.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs LM Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable easy to wear and pleasing to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Moy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product my daughter will love this on Xmas day x
customer_reviews.author: Hannah ladejixx

customer_reviews.title: Beware sizing
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable shoe. However beware of sizing. I’m a size 10 in all my shoes however when these arrived I could see they were far too large. Returned them straight away. Customer service was excellent. Ordered size 9 which fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tigershark

customer_reviews.title: Smart and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, I am wearing them without socks to let the air through. I am normally a size 13/48, but these are a 12/47.5 which fit ok with thin summer socks or without socks. They have elastic laces which aren't adjustable. I have cut them at the top of the shoe and fitted a spare adjustable toggle which takes any looseness out.
customer_reviews.author: shef

customer_reviews.title: Buy half size smaller for good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Comfortable and look classy in as much as leisure shoes can. I am 55. Very comfortable. Nothe though that as they are slip on I gother half a size smaller and glad I did. Previous slip on sketches I bought right size felt a little loose eventually so I cud not feel like I could run in them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr spageti

customer_reviews.title: I like Skechers
customer_reviews.text: I put "fit as expected", but I exchanged a size 10uk (my usual) for a size 9.5uk for a better fit, I think it's because the uppers are nice and flexible that I needed the half size smaller. Nice trainers and good to wear in the Gym, easy slip-ons as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ian C

customer_reviews.title: 😀
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable,love them bit loose so brought some memory foam insoles and fitted perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jason

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's 52642 Trainers
product_meta.description: These men's Elite Flex - Hartnell sneakers from Skechers feature skech knit mesh fabric and synthetic upper. Slip on bungee laced sporty comfort walking and training sneakers with interwoven designs. Air cooled memory foam insole, highly flexible comfort midsole. These sneakers also feature smooth synthetic overlays at lace areas for added durability, bungee stretch laced front panel for laced-look and slip on ease. These sneakers come with air cooled memory foam cushioned comfort insole, elite flex midsole with superior impact cushioning protection and remarkable energy return. The construction is highly flexible articulated midsole and outsole design for freedom of movement along with textured channel design midsole finish and flexible outsole.
